title: 10 Weird Tales of Magic and Wonder
description: Step inside and take a journey through the weird and the wonderful. Can Jonas escape the curse placed on him by the beautiful Isabella, or will he bring about his own doom? Can Mylas save his wife from an evil wizard, or will the past destroy them both? Who is the stranger who sits next to Charles at the bar and could his incredible story be true? Find the answers to these questions and more in 10 Weird Tales of Magic and Wonder.
author: Kyra Dune
